title: Lagging when I press in game recorder to record matches.
body:
Hey I'm just having a problem when I try recording my replays using the in game recorder. So yesterday I downloaded one of my replays and it was playing through the game without any lags but when i pressed the recorder button at the bottom of the screen the match started having lag spikes and it got worse during team fights. Anyone knows what the problem is or has anyone faced the same issue?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Still no idea why my fps has fallen suddenly over a week. It was fine since I had around 90 fps. Now it falles to 7 or 10.

There could be an issue with a driver or game file struggling to process when using your replay inputs.  The steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide should help smooth things out and clear up these spikes.  Let me know if that helps!

Hi Porocles. Thanks for assisting me regarding my fps issues in game. Just for a bit more information I'll try out the FPS guide you have mentioned me and this FPS issue has just started like last week and before that I was having no problems in game even with max graphic settings. But now whats happening is that this problem has now started occurring in game too while I'm playing and not just with recording. By the way I am using a mac book pro 13inch (mid 2012).
